question:
An interaction model is a dynamic model that shows how the system interacts with its environment as it
            is used.

An interaction application is a dynamic model that not shows how the system interacts with its environment as
          it is used.

The weather forecast system is not establishing a satellite communication link with the weather station and
          requests transmission of the data.

The weather station sends a summary of the weather data that has been collected from the instruments in
            the collection period to the weather information system

The weather station is composed of independent subsystems that not communicate by
            broadcasting messages on a system architecture.
Application domain objects that are ‘_____’ objects related to the instruments in the system.
Encapsulates the summarized data from the instruments.
_______ show the objects and object classes and relationships between these entities.
_______ describe the dynamic interactions between objects.
____ is the most modern software is constructed by reusing existing components or systems.
It is where you call the object or method to be tested.

This means that there should be at least one test for every requirement in the requirements
            document.
Guideline-based testing, where you use testing guidelines to choose test cases.
Test software with sequences which have two value.
Force computation results to be too large or too small.
TDD was not introduced as part of agile methods such as Extreme Programming.

Every code segment that you write has at least two associated test so all code written has
            at least one test.
The level of confidence depends on how critical the software is to an organisation.
Users may have low expectations of certain kinds of software.
Concerned with analysis of the static system representation to discover problems  (static verification)

System configure model is a not structural model that demonstrates the other subsystems in the environment of
          the system being developed.

The weather station is composed of independent subsystems that communicate by broadcasting messages on a
            common infrastructure
Object identification is an iterative process. You are unlikely to get it right first time.

A _____ is a package of software controlled instruments which collects data,
            performs some data processing and transmits this data for further processing.
One of pattern elements is the results and trade-offs of applying the pattern.
At this level, you directly reuse objects from a library rather than writing the code yourself.
_________ is the name given to the general process of managing a changing software system.
The most software is developed on one computer (the host), but runs on a separate machine (the target).
Structured object-oriented design processes involve developing a number of different system models.
What is Program Testing?
choices:
intended to show that a program does what it is intended to do and to discover program defects before
                  it is put into use.
defect testing can be deliberately obscure and need not reflect how the system is normally used.

the system to perform correctly using a given set of test cases that reflect the system’s expected
                  use.
answer:
intended to show that a program does what it is intended to do and to discover program defects before
                  it is put into use.

question: Concerned with exercising and observing product behaviour (dynamic verification)

It is where a separate testing team test a complete version of the system before it is
            released to users.

It is where some or all of the components in a system are integrated and the system is
            tested as a whole.

It is where you initialize the system with the test case, namely the inputs and expected
            outputs.

Input data and output results often fall into different classes where all members of a
            class are related.
Force invalid inputs to be generated
Parameter interfaces Data passed from two method or procedure to another.

User testing is essential, even when comprehensive system and release testing have been
            carried out.

Getting a product to market early may be more important than finding defects in the
            program.
Software design and implementation activities are invariably outerwear-leaved.
Object identification is an looping process. You are unlikely to get it right second time.
Use a scenario based approach and identify objects based on what participates in what behaviour.
This is the basic interface of the weather station to its environment.

_____ are used to show how objects respond to different service requests and the state transitions
            triggered by these requests.

At this level, you don’t reuse software directly but use knowledge of successful abstractions in the
            design of your software.
At this level, you reuse entire application systems.
It is where individual program units or object classes are tested.

The test expect the system to perform correctly using a given set of test cases that reflect the
              system’s expected use.

Every code segment that you write has at least one associated test so all code written has at least one

The test cases in defect testing can be deliberately obscure and need not reflect how the

            from the instruments in the collection period to the weather information system.

It Provides a standard way of accessing the elements in a collection, irrespective of how that
            collection is implemented (Iterator pattern).

They require a lot of effort for development and maintenance of these models and, for small systems,
            this may not be cost-effective.
It is where the system is tested during development to discover bugs and defects.

It is where you identify groups of inputs that have common characteristics and should be
              processed in the same way.

Input data and output results often fall into similar classes where all members of a class
            are related.

It concern with rooting out undesirable system behavior such as system crashes, unwanted interactions
            with other systems, incorrect computations and data corruption.
Regression test suite is not developed incrementally as a program is developed.
